summary:
Gives the Dwarven Crossbow a dark look
REQUIRES DAWNGUARD!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img203/5281/greatbow.png[/IMG]
Replaces all Dwarven Crossbows and requires Dawnguard

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img507/930/descriptione.png[/IMG]
I personally thought that making the best (Non Modded Crossbow) look more stealthy was a good idea and i personally like it. It adds a shade to the Dwarven Crossbow to make it look stealthy and a old look.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img254/7742/requirementsl.png[/IMG]
Requires Skyrim and Dawnguard, if you dont have Dawnguard your game will crash, but if you try it without Dawnguard im not responsible for any crashes.

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img28/5615/endorse.png[/IMG]
If you like what i did and want to see things lighter or darker or even different colors tell me and i will try. A way to show you like it please endorse it. A way to contact me is by email (Saddydogmods@aol.com or message me)

[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/3817/othermods.png[/IMG]
Check out my Nightingale House: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24488
author: Saddydog
